Title: Loneliest Number
Plot: When she is rejected from the writing class, Jenny sets out to win over her intimidating professor. Tina is devastated when she finds an email from Candace on Bette's computer, Dana and Alice continue to hide their attraction for each other, and Kit tries to find an opening act for her new club.
GuestStars: Tony Abatemarco,  Fabrice Grover,  Peter Shinkoda,  Michael Karl Richards,  Samantha Banton,  Barclay Hope,  Gary Jones,  Tony Salvatore,  Elizabeth Ziff,  Ted
